column2: SELECT G.ra,G.dec,G.type,G.cModelMag_g,G.cModelMag_r into mydb.CIRs_# From  galaxy G, mydb.CIRs x  -- this function outputs a table, so we have to do a join  WHERE     (G.flags & dbo.fPhotoFlags(&&&)) = # -- and the object is not saturated. f.PhotoFlags is a function that interprets the flag bits.    and x.name= G.ObjID  ORDER BY distance 				-- sort these by distance
